title: Handle Guest Complaint About Temperature
description: A guest in a luxury suite complains that it is too cold.

tasks.description: Access the building management system (BMS) to check the temperature and thermostat settings for that suite.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the thermostat is set to 65°F.

tasks.description: Remotely adjust the thermostat for the suite to a more comfortable temperature (e.g., 70°F).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully changes the thermostat setting.

tasks.description: Inform the guest that the temperature has been adjusted and will warm up shortly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the resolution to the guest.
